channel.title: How Do I Change Shop Prices?
channel.description:
Alright, so I know that I go into shops.cfg, then to the shop, but there are 4 columns, they are titled "Sell", "Buy", "Item", and "Amount" I know "Item", and "Amount" is the item ID and amount of it, then I'm on to "Buy" and "Sell". I changed on of these but nothing happened to the shop's prices. How Do I change the shop prices is my root question. Help is greatly apprieciated.
Thanks! Play For Keeps

item.title: How Do I Change Shop Prices?
item.dc:creator: @Modtacular Modtacular
item.description:
@Modtacular wrote:

under item.cfg

its all there

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Change Shop Prices?

item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

Alright, so I know that I go into shops.cfg, then to the shop, but there are 4 columns, they are titled “Sell”, “Buy”, “Item”, and “Amount”
I know “Item”, and “Amount” is the item ID and amount of it, then I’m on to “Buy” and “Sell”. I changed on of these but nothing happened to the shop’s prices. How Do I change the shop prices is my root question. Help is greatly apprieciated.

Thanks!
